pages.text: $(item)Stone Rocks$() can be found on the ground in most areas.$(p)$(item)Rocks$() can be crafted on the $(item)Worktable$().

If you ever find yourself under attack - $(italic)a phrase which here means subject to aggressive, violent, or harmful action$() - it would be wise to remember this:$(p)$(info) The act of throwing a $(item)Rock$() can also be an aggressive, violent, or harmful action.$(p)$(info) Placing a $(item)Rock$() to decorate a path, however, is not an aggressive, violent, or harmful action.
